website_summaries.verdict: A value buy from a reputable brand of vegan bars of soap recommended by dermatologists.
pros: Soap cleanses skin without drying it out
The included palm oil is Rainforest Alliance-certified
A fraction of the company’s profits are donated to charity
Range of pleasant scents to choose from, including lavender, mint, and coconut
cons: Smell does not linger very long

customer_reviews.title: "Natural" is one of the most over-used terms
customer_reviews.text: And the places you find the word often means nothing since this is not a regulated term. It is just the buzzword you find on so many products. Nevertheless, in looking at the list of ingredients, this truly is a natural product without scents and other chemicals that are of dubious benefit. I've been using Tom's products for years, and though I have no way of testing the veracity of any claims that are made, I just feel comfortable with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Toms is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Toms soap is Awesome. I tried this at a girlfriends house and asked what it was & I have never went back. I used to have storage closets stocked with the Irish spring & probably should have had stock in the company but now Tom’s is the only soap that I keep stocked in my storage closets.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: MINI sized
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the review first. These are MINI sized bar soaps like the ones you are given in a hotel room. We returned them for the correct size only to find that 6 bars of regular size cost even more than this huge pack of minis.
customer_reviews.author: ScotFlowerTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: Palm Oil
customer_reviews.text: Smells SO good but subtle. Lathers well & I love the natural ingredients. However, after ordering I found out that it contains palm oil, and while rainforest allegiance certified, sustainable palm oil still contributes to deforestation and causes the same issues. I actually love this soap but will not be reordering for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Madison S

customer_reviews.title: A lie - no tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: This is not tea tree soap....period. stop lying to people. This item was replaced twice after sending me soap with no tea tree. Three shipments later, I'm done with this product. All three shipments were not what your description says... this does NOT contain tea tree oil!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Turns to Mush
customer_reviews.text: I had used Tom's soap before with great results, but I think it was in a guest bathroom or other low-use situation. This time I bought it for kitchen duty - and the heavy usage makes it soft and smeary. Kinda falling apart. Goopy. The soap is not sitting in water or wet soap dish - but well drained, high and dry. 'Just passing this along.
customer_reviews.author: michie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin, and the list of chemicals I’m allergic to seems to grow daily. This soap has been a blessing. It is very easy on my skin and I’m able to wash daily with no allergic reactions. Most commercial soaps make me itchy and red, some cause hives even. I will forever be a costumer using this soap! And I love that it comes in a bulk package.
customer_reviews.author: H.Urig

customer_reviews.title: Outpriced themselves
customer_reviews.text: I loved this stuff for years, until they doubled the price. Sorry TOM you lost my buisness.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Latherless
customer_reviews.text: A disappointment. Mild to the point of why bother. Hardly any lather . Hardly any scent. Plenty of palm oil. Moisturizing , I guess. if you like palm oil you will like this. Product needs a complete "new and improved" re-vamp. Increase lather/clean/scent and you'll build better brand loyalty for this one.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Lightly scented, for the fragrance intolerant
customer_reviews.text: I'd normally need an unscented soap, due to my extreme scent and fragrance intolerance and allergies. But this scent is so light and natural (orange oil), that it is non intrusive and does not stick around once out of the shower. >> I can not tolerate scented products, so me saying this is light, means a lot. BUT if you have super-extreme MCS, I highly recommend the unscented bar, as well!
customer_reviews.author: GeekWad

customer_reviews.title: Great soap.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is great, the bars are big, and it cleans well. Best of all, this soap doesn't contain animal fat (tallow) like all the mainstream soaps do.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best soap I’ve used. I have sensitive skin and wanted a natural soap for my body and of course I was skeptical about bars of soap but I gotta say, I feel cleaner than ever. I don’t have any problems with any irritation or dry skin. I feel this soap removes all the dead skin and leaves your body moisturized, healthy and clean. Also it’s smells great! The only bad thing I can say (which it isn’t that big of a deal) is the tub gets a bit slippery but that can be fixed with a tub grip mat. Other than that I love it! MONEY WELL SPENT!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Worthy Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have ultra sensitive skin, so this soap is perfect for me, lathers well, cleans my skin thoroughly and gentle especially on my private areas, which I can’t use any scented harsh soaps on!
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great soap for double the price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this soap for years and really love the smell, the moisturizing properties, and the way it cleans. HOWEVER, it is unconscionable that they have actually DOUBLED the price of 6 bars of this stuff since I bought it last--and that is including the discount for Subscribe & Save ordering! What a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Poor moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: In spite of the Moroccan oil, this is one of the most drying soaps I have tried. I live in the high desert and usually need to apply lotion after showering even with a good moisturizing soap, but this soap is particularly drying.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Only received one bar for $24!
customer_reviews.text: I only received one bar of soap! It was supposed to be a package. Paid $24
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A very nice soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap lathers like a rich luxurious spa soap. The bar is long lasting as long as you keep it dry after use. The scent is light and fresh. I would recommend a draining soap pad to lengthen it’s life. This is a great natural product and it’s price is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: TONIA R ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed that Tom's has discontinued their old bar soap formulations
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that Tom's has discontinued their old bar soap formulations, which I used for many years. I decided to try one of their new formulations and the smell is way too strong. Will search for a new brand of bar soap.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like orange blossom at all
customer_reviews.text: What is with Tom's of Maine? Seems like they are "selling out" on using their good formulas. I bought this because I could no longer find Tom's of Main Olive Oil soap bar, which I loved. It was very gentle on the skin, and had a fantastic natural scent. These bars seems like ordinary (mild) soap, scented with inexpensive orange oil. I would not pay the high price again, will keep looking....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent, without being overpowering
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this product yet, as it was purchased for bathroom decor/for use by house guests. It looks great as decor and has an amazing scent that is not overpowering, but just right. I will update my review once I use the soap myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: No tea tree
customer_reviews.text: The product shown says “lavender tea tree,” but there is no tea tree in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Wise

customer_reviews.title: This says 6 bars only received one
customer_reviews.text: No matter how good a bar of soap is 21$ a bar is too much!!!
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent. A little quick and easy to melt.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. First time using Tom's soaps. Absolutely in love with the scent—after all the orange tree crops were left to die out where I live, I've sorely missed the smell of fresh orange blossoms. Ingredients are good. Price is good. One star off because they are very melty so try and store in a dry place that doesn't get misty overspray (difficult in a shower, I know).
customer_reviews.author: Auds

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap
customer_reviews.text: I switched to bar soap and Toms specifically, it has helped my dry skin out a lot and doesn’t make me feel like I have soap residue stuck to my skin. All the soap arrived in perfect condition, not melted or anything. This is a good deal versus going to the store and buying each soap bar individually.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Great soap for dry sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells great and does not leave any residue on your skin. My family suffers from dry skin, and this soap helps leave our skin feeling moisturized. Will continue ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R.

customer_reviews.title: clean without burn or itch & long-lasting soap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My skin feels clean & not dry. I don’t burn or itch anywhere. I feel clean for days. The bar (if on a soap dish that lets it completely dry all around) lasts forever. It hardly shrinks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: Good smell!
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's favorite! It is a little fruity, but not overbearing and just smells clean. He likes it for sensitive skin and he always has to have a bar. We feel this is a little more natural than drugstore options. It is pricey, though!
customer_reviews.author: H. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not responsible to follow the orders
customer_reviews.text: I recieved one bar which it is supposed to be 6 packs. They are irresponsible to serve us properly manner..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this soap
customer_reviews.text: I have used these soaps for the past two, three years and I especially like the scent. I used also Tom's toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good option.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it does not leave my skin feeling dry unlike many others do, but I would enjoy a slightly more notable scent when I use it. Some ppl like a mild scent but I wld prefer a slightly more notable scent.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Great soap... just not a powerful scent
customer_reviews.text: Great soap. I normally use the orange blossom... but this one was good... There are tons of suds, and leaves your skin feeling soft... it just didn't really smell like anything... the coconut and argon oil scent is almost non existent... but it is a great product! I will re-order... just not this scent.
customer_reviews.author: GenoTheCarGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great soap, creamy lather
customer_reviews.text: This stuff produces some incredibly creamy lather. It smells wonderful, if you like coconut you'll love the smell of this soap. It's very gentle, and it's pretty good at not drying out my skin so much like other soaps sometimes do.
customer_reviews.author: sentientmop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent soap.
customer_reviews.text: I love Tom's of Maine soap, especially this scent. It cleans well and lasts a long time. I've tried several different soaps from this brand and I love the smell of each one. The best part is, these soaps don't contain animal fat. All the mainstream soaps contain animal fat, listed in the ingredients as tallow or sodium tallowate. This company also doesn't test its soap on animals, which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Not enough scent
customer_reviews.text: I love eucalyptus and was hoping this soap would have that strong eucalyptus scent. Unfortunately I does not. It's just not nearly strong enough. If you've tried Dr. Bronner's Eucalyptus bar soap, this is not nearly as good. It's more moisturizing though. Good for those who want a lighter soap.
customer_reviews.author: An Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Creamy soap, good for the skin
customer_reviews.text: This bar of soap is so creamy and smooth. Scent not obtrusive at all. Love the way my skin feels after using it. I do not have sensitive skin, but the soap is very mild. I’ve never used a Tom’s product I didn’t like.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: good product, no aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I may be odd one out here, but most toothpastes seem to have this fake sugar aftertaste. Not what I want when I brush my teeth. This has a good clean taste, does its job on my teeth, and still feels fresh after 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Bunches McGuinty

customer_reviews.title: Rip off. Paid for 12, only got 1.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $14 for 12 bars & only got ONE bar. I don't care how good the soap is. One tiny bar is NOT worth $14.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The soap was fantastic Nothing bad to say Aromatic Leaves you feeling clean
customer_reviews.author: Philos

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell but works fine
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t love the smell of the aloe vera soap. Smells sort of like what I would imagine lard would smell like. Other than that it works fine as a face bar. Feels moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for all the boys in my house. It's a gentle scent and the bar is very moisturizing. We will be getting a subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah May

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bars
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap, but the bar sizes are what you would expect to get in a hotel room. Was not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Good soap just not the smell I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Great soap, does not dry skin out. Does what soap is meant to do. Three stars because it is orange scented soap, but when you wash with it you smell just like unsweetened grape koolaid tastes like.
customer_reviews.author: wesley anderson

customer_reviews.title: refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar soap The soap feels wonderful and lathers well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: NO EUCALYPTUS SCENT
customer_reviews.text: This has no Eucalyptus scent at all. Though it is nice soap. Does a nice job of washing and moisturizing. Without leaving a oilly feel. Size is normal bar soap size.
customer_reviews.author: SWB

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural soap
customer_reviews.text: If you've been trying to buy a natural soap, you know how hard it is to find one. I used to love the 7th Generation bar soap until it became impossible to find. This was my next find and I really love it. Nice natural light fragrance. Feels great on the skin not leaving any residue. I bought the 6 pack and would definitely do again.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I love Tom’s I have the toothpaste and deodorant also, but I think the soap has been drying out my skin despite it being for sensitive skin. I don’t know if it’s the product or I’m allergic to something in it (but i don’t have any known allergies.) I bought a 6 pack, used 2 and unfortunately had to give the other 4 away. I’m just going to buy my soaps from Lush from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Akins

customer_reviews.title: Quality made product
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great product and has cleared up my skin a lot. The scent is lite but smells great just not very strong. Definitely a great made product.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Stabbin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone else but their feedback was that it's not bad. At least it gets the job done. They said you can't smell the lavender very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap but didn't realize this was TRAVEL SIZE and not the full size bars. Still my family will use as the scent and product are so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Creamy Lather
customer_reviews.text: We love this product and this was a good deal. I had a friend spend a week and she asked me about the soap because she loved the creamy lather it produced.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBun

customer_reviews.title: Great soap for face
customer_reviews.text: Great soap, with nice scent and very gentle. I paid sixteen for 6 bars, though. Thirty five for 6 bars currently advertised is price gouging. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Barnthouse

customer_reviews.title: Good for non-stinky bodies
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves these. “Favorite soap ever!” I don’t think it’s good for stinky people though. I seriously wash twice and doesn’t seem like it did anything. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: FilmComposer

customer_reviews.title: Very light scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very light which is perfect for my extremely sensitive skin. It lathers and rinses very well.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa B

customer_reviews.title: I will order again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soap with a perfect fragrance. Will purchase again. Love to see the company make the soap in a old fashioned Rose fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: J A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Tom’s of Maine
customer_reviews.text: Can always depend on your products being wrapped professionally and the Expiration date is legible ! 10 stars in my book. I tried Yardley it was horrible, I had to go back to what I’ve always used and never had any reactions to “Tom’s of Maine” good old fashion “Lavender soap with Shea butter. “ Thank You thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizing Body Bar
customer_reviews.text: Great scent from a good variety of Tom’s of Maine products. A larger selection avaible to select from Amazon. Great price and great scent in this moisturizing body bar. No complaints for this product, seller or Amazon. Just a request to continue to provide access to this and other Tom’s of Maine Products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Smells good. My husband and i have both started using ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. My husband and i have both started using it. We looked for a bar soap by Burt's Bees, but could not find one. He already uses Tom's of Maine toothpaste, so I decided to give this a try. We are already on our second order, with no plans to change.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is soft, smells great and rinses off clean without any soap residue. Will be buying it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Buys A Lot

customer_reviews.title: Lathers up nicely
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this soap lathers up & my skin feels very moisturized. Yes I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marshcoco

customer_reviews.title: My favorite soap. Wish it was a little cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I love this creamy coconut soap. It's my absolute favorite moisturizing soap particularly in the dry winter months! Because of the cost I don't use it exclusively, but try to at least half the time. It's definitely worth the money though and I keep my eye out for multi pack discounts.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was no scent.
customer_reviews.text: I used the original Tom's sensitive which was unscented. This replacement works well but I would rather have an unscented sensitive soap.
customer_reviews.author: Beth F

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good
customer_reviews.text: This bar soap smells nice without being too overpowering. It is great for sensitive skin and is pretty moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Bratlie

customer_reviews.title: Please realize these are hotel/hospital (tiny) sized bars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing soap, great scent and perfect for sensitive skin! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Fredianelli

customer_reviews.title: drying
customer_reviews.text: no one in my family seems to like this soap, it is drying
customer_reviews.author: L. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother who has sensitive skin, he loves it! And it smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: Kathereen T.

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell..
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to this soap, but I love the smell, and will always fondly think of this soap every now and then when I am lonely and need a hug.
customer_reviews.author: The Boog

customer_reviews.title: Great soap!
customer_reviews.text: Creamy, non-drying product. Love this soap. Hope they will drop the price, but it is great soap!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: this was ok not as wowed as i thought
customer_reviews.text: ok smell my partner did not like it. he is sensitive to smells tho.....
customer_reviews.author: Eric W & Gisselle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good but the smell doesn't last out side the shower
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good, functional soap...
customer_reviews.text: 4*s because they produce an awful lot of soap scum.
customer_reviews.author: Provivalist

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy if you’re looking  for the size sold in stores
customer_reviews.text: pay attention to the size .. these are small bars of soap .. classified as travel size .
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Moreno

customer_reviews.title: My go to shower bar
customer_reviews.text: Great lather. Little to no scent. Great daily bar for showering
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This soap is very mild and lathers great. Plus, Tom’s products are not tested on animals which is really important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Short on order by five
customer_reviews.text: I was suppose to get a 6 count and only received 1 today.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odd scent
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because the scent didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma St Lucie

customer_reviews.title: Product is Substandard
customer_reviews.text: The soap product is substandard– there is zero lavender scent–zero or color.
customer_reviews.author: Ike Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. This was a Good value considering this soap is generally expensive as hell. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This scent is similar to jasmine, but not in ...
customer_reviews.text: This scent is similar to jasmine, but not in a pleasant way. The texture is flaky towards the end of the bar which makes it break into multiple pieces that are difficult to use in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: big mac

customer_reviews.title: Non-itchy Soap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this soap as I am extremely sensitive to soaps with chemicals. Works good, lathers good and It doesn’t make my skin itch so I would buy again. I only wish it had a stronger smell.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing in One Way
customer_reviews.text: This soap lathers very well, BUT the scent is too light for me. I won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Gal

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good soap
customer_reviews.text: Scent is really present on a new bar of soap. Not so much over time. But this soap lasts and lasts. In our soft water house, it really lathers up quickly. I'm ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this natural soap. Cleans effectively, without drying out the skin. Natural fragrance is safe for my chemical sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Haute Interiors, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Father has cancer and this is the only soap he can use that doesn’t irritate his skin. Great product
customer_reviews.author: randall derrick suggs

customer_reviews.title: Its a ToMS.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and the way it lathers up a great product, This company is great and love their products.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Horse

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Sensitive soap
customer_reviews.text: It's very difficult to find good soap without added scent. I was sad when Tom's discontinued their "Sensitive" soap, which was perfect for me. But this new one's quite a good replacement, though I cut the bars in half to make a smaller fit for my hand. Which also makes them seem to last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Jane L. Mickelson

customer_reviews.title: It’s soap
customer_reviews.text: Great soap and a great smell to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good in terms of being free of certain chemicals but the scent is not there. I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Heymanchal Sidoo

customer_reviews.title: A great soap for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great soap for sensitive skin. Some of the other moisturizing soaps cause me to break out with hives or pimples after a few weeks. This soap does not do that
customer_reviews.author: Sharmutti

customer_reviews.title: Really for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only soap I use in the shower. Most scented soaps either make my skin smell weird or causes itchiness. I am so thankful to have found this soap and have been using it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: jcannonfire

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive what I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I only received only 1of the 12 bars of soap I purchased. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: All around good soap
customer_reviews.text: In the past I used liquid soap and I almost always felt grimmy afterwards. Now we use this bar soap and the best part is the ingredients make you feel like your doing right by your body
customer_reviews.author: Anna Berglund

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for allergic person.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product because it has a nice scent and it does not give me any allergic reaction like most of the soaps out there.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Drzen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soap!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to explain how great this soap is. We have tried many other brands and keep coming back to Tom's soap.
customer_reviews.author: HPZ

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: A very dense, long lasting soap with a excellent scent and excellent cleaning power. Lasts twice as long as any “regular” bar soap.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about soap, but I really like the scent of this one! Also, one bar lasts a very long time, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NEW FAVE SOAP
customer_reviews.text: scent is very subtle, almost scentless? but they feel very natural and are not drying like some soaps are. i find tom's products very natural and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: alice h

customer_reviews.title: Costly, but smells good
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap...smells great, but the cost is too expensive. I'm looking for other vegan-friendly products that won't break the budget.
customer_reviews.author: Decha Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Tom's good soap mon
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes it and she is f***ing picky about soap and hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: Mr E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good on my sensitive skin. Like using a bar it lasts longer than bottled cleansers
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: Great soap.
customer_reviews.text: Best soap ever. I use this everyday. The bars last forever it seems. You can actually see a difference in lathering and feel a difference as to how clean you are. Regularly buy when I get low.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick P.

product_meta.title: Tom’s of Maine Natural Beauty Bar, Bar Soap, Natural Soap, Creamy Coconut with Virgin Coconut Oil, 5 Ounce, 6-Pack
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Creamy Coconut| Size:5 Ounce (6 Count)Our Natural Beauty Bars, bar soap are gentle on skin while also helping maintain your skin's natural moisture. Our formulas feature organic botanicals - like virgin coconut oil, raw shea butter, or Moroccan argan oil. And because we care about the sustainability of our ingredients, for added peace of mind these bars also use Rainforest Alliance Certified™ palm oil. Tom's of Maine products only use ingredients that meet their Stewardship standards for natural, sustainable and responsible, helping to empower families to live more naturally. Tom's of Maine is a Certified B-Corp and meets the highest standards of social and environmental performance, public transparency and legal accountability. The company donates 10% of profits to charities committed to children's health, education and the environment. Thank you for supporting Tom's of Maine.
feature_bullets: WHAT YOU'LL GET: Contains six - 5 ounce bars of all natural bar soap in Creamy Coconut scent
WASH AWAY GERMS: Washing your hands with our natural bar soap helps to wash away unwanted germs and bacteria
GENTLE ON SKIN: Natural soap tested by dermatologists to maintain skins natural moisture with no artificial colors, fragrances, or preservatives. Not tested on animals
PARABEN-FREE SOAP: This moisturizing natural bar soap is dermatologist-tested and has no parabens
NATURAL & RESPONSIBLE: Tom's of Maine Bar Soap contains no artificial fragrances or preservatives and is not tested on animals

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
